img.style: border: 0px solid; border-image: none; width: 150px; height: 50px;

p.a: Click here for more information

p.strong: Governor Greg Abbott issued an executive order today that all schools across the State of Texas will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Please continue to check our website and our Facebook page for updates.

p.style: margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; line-height: 21.6px; font-size: 18px; text-align: center;

span.strong: To assist our North Lamar ISD families in meeting the needs of our students during the district closure, school breakfast and lunches

span.span: All meals will be provided in a “grab and go”
style via curbside service at Higgins Elementary and Parker Elem

span.strong: Beginning Monday, April 6th all meals for the week will be prepared and distributed for the entire week. Meals will be available for pick up from 8:00 a.m. - 10:00 a.m.

p.style: margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; line-height: 21.6px; font-size: 18px; text-align: center;

p.strong: If you have moved into the North Lamar Independent School District and need to enroll a student please contact the following if you have a student that is in:

td.p: Higgins Elementary PreK-1st - Lori Malone @ lmalone@northlamar.net
Parker Elementary PreK-5th - Kristin Hughes @ khughes@northlamar.net

Stone Middle School 6th-8th - Lindsey Miller @
lmiller@northlamar.net
North Lamar High School 9th-12th - Clay Scarborough @ cscarborough@northlamar.net
